entry.title: New release for Pulse: v3.31.2
entry.content:
🎉 Version 3.31.2

This patch release fixes critical issues with multi-instance monitoring and removes environment-specific code.

What's Changed

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Multi-Instance VM Display - Fixed VM/container deduplication to properly handle separate Proxmox instances (#199)
  • Environment-Specific Code - Removed hardcoded references and logic specific to development environment
  • Mobile Display - Added horizontal scrolling to PBS tables for better mobile experience
  • Function Typo - Fixed function name typo in socketHandler.js

🚀 Improvements

  • Build Performance - Optimized Docker builds with better layer caching
  • Release Size - Reduced release tarball size by 46% through optimization

📥 Installation & Updates

See the Updating Pulse section in README for detailed update instructions.

🐳 Docker Images

  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:v3.31.2
  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:latest

entry.title: New release for Pulse: v3.32.0
entry.content:
🎉 Version 3.32.0

This release brings some UI/UX improvements, enhanced chart functionality with time range selection, and numerous bug fixes.

What's Changed

✨ New Features

  • Chart Time Range Selector - Select different time ranges for charts with up to 7 days of data retention
  • Enhanced PBS Diagnostics - Improved diagnostics for troubleshooting PBS namespace filtering issues

🚀 Improvements

  • Enhanced Chart Tooltips - Improved hover indicators and tooltip positioning, even after page scrolling
  • Better Time Display - Clearer time formatting in chart tooltips

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Chart Tooltip Positioning - Fixed tooltips appearing in wrong position after page scroll
  • PBS Namespace Filtering - Corrected PBS instance filtering when namespace filter is active
  • Webhook Configuration - Fixed 400 errors when configuring alert webhooks
  • Frontend Stability - Prevented UI freeze when saving alert configurations
  • Uptime Accuracy - Ensured VM/container uptime stays current in dashboard
  • Data Privacy - Properly sanitize all sensitive data in diagnostics output
  • Row Height Consistency - Fixed inconsistent row heights between alerts and thresholds modes

📥 Installation & Updates

See the Updating Pulse section in README for detailed update instructions.

🐳 Docker Images

  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:v3.32.0
  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:latest

entry.title: New release for Pulse: v3.33.0
entry.content:
🎉 Version 3.33.0

This release completely reworks the backup system with separated Backups and Snapshots tabs for better organization.

What's Changed

✨ New Features

  • Separated Backups and Snapshots Tabs - The old combined Backups tab has been split into two dedicated tabs for clearer organization
  • Enhanced Filtering - Added VM/LXC filter toggles and reset button to the new Backups tab
  • PBS Push Mode (Experimental) - Initial support for PBS servers to push metrics to Pulse

🚀 Improvements

  • Chart Performance - Improved performance of chart time selectors
  • Date Formatting - Uses browser locale for date displays
  • UI Consistency - Various styling and responsive design fixes across tables

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Backup Coverage - Fixed backup coverage indicator and chart display issues
  • Mobile View - Fixed text wrapping in tables on mobile devices
  • Date Sorting - Fixed chronological sorting of date groups

🧹 Code Improvements

  • Major code cleanup and removal of unused files
  • Modularized server logic for better maintainability

📥 Installation & Updates

See the Updating Pulse section in README for detailed update instructions.

🐳 Docker Images

  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:v3.33.0
  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:latest

entry.title: New release for Pulse: v3.33.1
entry.content:
🔧 Version 3.33.1

Critical fix for in-app update functionality.

What's Fixed

🐛 Bug Fix

  • Update Process - Fixed crash during in-app updates caused by missing WebSocket reference in modularized update routes

🚨 Affected Versions

The following versions have broken in-app updates: - v3.33.0-rc1 - v3.33.0-rc2
- v3.33.0

Note: v3.32.0 and earlier versions can update directly to v3.33.1 without issues.

📝 If You're Stuck on an Affected Version

If your in-app update fails, you can manually update using: bash sudo /opt/pulse/scripts/install-pulse.sh --update

📥 Installation & Updates

See the Updating Pulse section in README for detailed update instructions.

🐳 Docker Images

  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:v3.33.1
  • docker pull rcourtman/pulse:latest

entry.title: New release for Pulse: v3.40.1 - Critical PBS Settings Fix
entry.content:
🚨 Hotfix Release

This is an emergency patch release that fixes a critical regression introduced in v3.40.0-rc1.

🐛 Critical Bug Fix

  • PBS Settings Tab - Restored the missing Proxmox Backup Server configuration tab in the settings modal. Without this tab, users were unable to configure PBS connections through the UI.

If you installed v3.40.0-rc1, please update to this version immediately.

📥 Installation & Updates

See the Updating Pulse section in README for detailed update instructions.
